question: 1. Time Complexity of insertion in Red Black Tree with n nodes is ______.
2. Breadth First Traversal of a tree can be used for ____________.

answers.a: Finding the shortest distance to every other node from the root in the tree
answers.c: Finding strongly connected components in the tree.

question: 3. What is common in three different types of traversals (Inorder, Preorder and Postorder)?

answers.a: Root is visited before the right subtree.
answers.b: Left subtree is always visited before the right subtree.
answers.c: Root is visited after the left subtree.

question: 4. A binary tree can be uniquely re-constructed from ____________.
5. The inorder and preorder traversal of a binary tree are d b e a f c g and a b d e c f g respectively. The postorder traversal of the binary tree is____________.

answers.a: d e b f g a c
answers.b: d e b f g c a
answers.c: e d b g f c a
answers.d: d e f g b c a
